original_text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard about all that was going on. And he was perplexed because some were saying that John had been raised from the dead,
korean_text: 분봉 왕 헤롯이 이 모든 일을 듣고 심히 당황하니 이는 어떤 사람은 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났다고도 하며

sentences.original_text: about all that was going on
that John had been raised from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 죽었던 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났다고
